## About Me
MPH, Epidemiology. Focus on infectious disease and global health. Advocate for human rights, female empowerment, and Crenshaw's intersectionality framework. 

Poet, artist, and data scientist. I am from South Florida with a family history from Guyana. Multilingual with an ambition to expand my language abilities. Proficient in R, SAS, and GIS with an ambition to expand my programming abilities. 

On this site, you will find my experiences, academic history, and an example dashboard using data from the P8105 data science class.
